GLOBALLOGIC d.o.o..position_title: Junior Software Engineer - Bluetooth podrska za drustvenu igru
GLOBALLOGIC d.o.o..position_desc:
Radi se o jednostavnoj drustvenoj igri koja je izvediva i bez dodatnog HW-a ali se njegovim koristenjem moze oplemeniti.
Pravila su sljedeca:
Potrebno je manje drustvo okupljeno oko TV-a
Odabire se neki film za gledanje prema osobnom ukusu
Na TV se zalijepi nekoliko setova brkova izrezanih od papira
Igraci pokusavaju zaustaviti film u trenu kada se nalijepljeni brkovi poklope s nekim od likova. Ako uspiju svi moraju popiti jedan gutljaj piÄ‡a po izboru (vode, soka od narance i sl., samo bez alkohola!)
Nakon toga svi se u glas lijepo nasmiju i film se pusta dalje
Ovakva klasicna verzija igre "brkovi" je vise kooperativnog karaktera i svi igraci rade na istom cilju, a to je skupna hidratacija.
Igru je moguce uciniti kompetitivnijom na nacin da se omoguci svakom igracu istovremeno da ima mogucnost zaustavljanja filma.
Jos ako se doda mogucnost detekcije koji je igrac tocno zaustavio film, moguce je igri dodati razna pravila poput:
Ako netko zaustavi film u pravom trenutku piju svi osim njega (ili mozda on ima pravo odabrati tko pije)
Ako netko zaustavi film u krivom trenutku pije samo on
Na taj nacin cilj postaje: hidratiraj sve osim sebe sto doprinosi interesantnijoj dinamici.
Zadatak na vrlo neozbiljan nacin pruza praktican uvid u Bluetooth komunikaciju, implikacije firmware dizajna na potrosnju energije i multi-tasking na bare metal embedded sustavima. S druge strane, stvar je dovoljno jednostavna da ne zahtjeva opsezno iskustvo.
Programski alati:
Editor po izboru :)
GCC
GNU make

HUAWEI TECHNOLOGIES d.o.o..company_desc:
Huawei is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices. With integrated solutions across four key domains â€“ telecom networks, IT, smart devices, and cloud services â€“ we are committed to bringing digital to every person, home and organization for a fully connected, intelligent world.
Huawei's end-to-end portfolio of products, solutions and services are both competitive and secure. Through open collaboration with ecosystem partners, we create lasting value for our customers, working to empower people, enrich home life, and inspire innovation in organizations of all shapes and sizes.
At Huawei, innovation focuses on customer needs. We invest heavily in basic research, concentrating on technological breakthroughs that drive the world forward. We have more than 180,000 employees, and we operate in more than 170 countries and regions. Founded in 1987, Huawei is a private company fully owned by its employees.

Key responsibilities:
Provide technical support for FTTX project deployment, implementation, and maintenance. In charge of all technical and device problems.
Provide technical support for DSLAM (broadband service) project deployment, implementation, and maintenance. In charge of all technical and device problems.
Provide technical support for MSAN (VOIP) project deployment, implementation, and maintenance. In charge of all technical and device problems.
Get involved in product optimization and improvement from installation and maintenance point of view.
Write and review product document.
Training delivery for other engineers.

Bachelor degree or above related to Telecommunication Technology, Computer Science & Technology, Information Technology. Working experience in Access Network is a must.
Knowledge about FTTH, FTTB, FTTC, FTTM solutions.

Good interpersonal communication skills and high ability to work in multicultural and multinational teams

Team player, self-motivated, result-oriented and highly independent

HR Cloud is California based SaaS (Software-As-a-Service) company with over 1,300+ customers and over 150 employees.  We have been recognised by Inc. 500|5000 and Deloitte Technology Fast 500 five years in a row. Our offices in Croatia are located in Split and Zagreb.

We build SaaS products for better HR! HR Cloud is the modern HR software and engagement platform intended to foster team work, maximize productivity and employee appraisal process.

Memgraph d.o.o..company_desc:
Memgraph is a fast-growing startup in the rapidly emerging graph database industry. Our cloud-native graph database platform helps companies around the world turn complex data into optimal decisions by solving a class of problems using graph theory.
Our commitment to innovation, technological advancement, and developer experience make Memgraph the #1 graph analytic platform that delivers the fastest and easiest solution for solving complex graph data problems in production environments, in a time frame previously unimaginable.
Memgraph d.o.o..position_desc:
There is a fair chance that you have only worked on faculty-related projects so far. Perhaps you might already have some software development experience. Either way, we believe that this is the perfect opportunity for every student that wants to broaden their horizons and acquire new skills this summer.
OUR INTERNSHIP PROJECTS
#1 Developer Love
During this internship, you will work with the
Developer Relations team
to develop a full-fledged, end-to-end web application that will solve a specific problem using Memgraph. For example, you could create an application that makes movie recommendations based on the user's preferences or an app that finds the best route for a delivery truck. We have prepared a few exciting topics and suggestions, but you will also pitch your ideas. The only requirement is that the web application needs to incorporate Memgraph and solve a real-world problem.
Python, Algorithms, Full-stack development, UI/UX, Memgraph, Cypher
#2 MAGE
The rollout of new technology always affects how wizards do business. In Memgraph, wizards created algorithmic procedures called MAGE. Join them on their quest to create more useful content inside MAGE: new algorithms, utility libraries, demos, blog posts, and many more.
C++, Python, Rust, Writing, Memgraph, Algorithm, Graph data science
#3 Core
If you are the person who loves to scratch beyond the surface, then your choice is the
Core Database Engine team
where you will develop the core infrastructure behind Memgraph. This includes developing in-memory and on-disk data structures and algorithms with a strong focus on graphs, networking, query optimization, and execution.
C++ and STL, Algorithms and data structures, Database development
Maybe this sounds a bit overwhelming at first, but you donâ€™t have to worry. The app will be simple enough for you to learn everything there is to know on time, and we will be there every step of the way. Which programming language you use is not important. Whatâ€™s important is your willingness to learn and contribute.
Memgraph d.o.o..competences:
Do you have the right qualifications for this project? The answer is definitely YES.
Everything needed for this project can be learned and achieved if you are just motivated.
We will organize lectures to get everyone started, and you will also get a personal mentor that will guide you through the whole experience.
Donâ€™t be shy - just apply!
Memgraph d.o.o..compensation: Paid internship -> Our interns contribute to the team and put forth their best efforts, it's only fair they're fairly compensated for their work. Remote position -> Due to COVID-19, we have gone fully remote and are expecting to stay remote during the entire course of summer 2021. Mentorship -> Each of our interns is matched with 1 experienced engineer who will closely oversee their work and help you grow as an engineer. Work that sees the light of day -> Our interns push code, build exciting applications, products, and internal tools.

Rimac Automobili d.o.o..company_desc:
Rimac is a technology powerhouse, manufacturing electric hypercars and providing full technology solutions to global automotive manufacturers. Founded in 2009 with headquarters in Croatia, Rimac started as a garage project and grew into a globally recognized technology leader, built upon the passion and vision of the company's Founder and CEO Mate Rimac.
Strongly believing that electric propulsion systems can be used to power the new generation of sports cars and make them better, faster and more exciting, he has started the project with a handful of people as his team. The companyâ€™s flagship, the Concept_One, was entirely designed, developed and manufactured in-house. In 2018 Rimac introduced the next generation hypercar, the C_Two, a car alive with technology.
Today, the company numbers over 600 people and has grown into a leader within a highly competitive industry with the ambition to become a full electrification partner for many OEMs. Rimac Automobili has challenged the status-quo with the vision to revolutionize and reinvent the sports car with its unique technology thus successfully tackling the electrification challenge set upon the automotive industry. Most of all, we are excited to offer customers the opportunity to use our technology and know-how to create new and exciting products.
Rimac Automobili d.o.o..position_desc:
Embedded Hardware Engineer Intern position will grant you an opportunity to be a part of engineering team working on the development of hardware components for Rimac Automobili vehicles and OEM projects. You will work in dynamic and supportive environment with experienced and ambitious engineers on high-end state-of-the-art projects utilizing latest technologies in respective fields and automotive industry. You will learn how design process looks like, requirements are defined and transferred to final product, cooperation between hardware and software teams works, high-end multi-layer PCBs are designed, documentation is made, and tests are performed. Besides standard design topics you will get in touch with automotive processes and standards like ECE-R10, LV124, Functional Safety (ISO 26262) and others.
As Embedded Hardware Engineer intern you will get an opportunity to work in one of three main Embedded Hardware teams located in Zagreb; BMS, IVI and Inverter. You will be assigned to the team that will fit you best according to your abilities and aspirations.
Battery Management System (BMS) is one of the most important systems in an electric vehicle. It controls the whole battery pack and is responsible for proper functioning of the battery pack. The BMS is responsible for voltage and temperature measurements of all battery cells, current, isolation and voltage measurements of the battery pack, as well as controlling the pre-charge circuit and all high-voltage relays and contactors.
Infotainment system (IVI) is highly complex system providing mixture of information and entertainment to the occupants. IVI system is usually comprised of various displays, main and supportive control units, antennas, cameras, audio devices and similar. What differentiates IVI systems from other is high-speed design along with specific EMC requirements.
Inverter is, along with battery and motor, most important device in electric car. Its purpose is to drive electric motor using energy from the battery and doing it in a way to keep high efficiency, high level of control and utilizing maximum performance from electric motor. As Inverter is high-voltage and high-power component, design teams face various cooling, insulation, and EMC/EMI challenges on their way to develop reliable and powerful product.
Rimac Automobili d.o.o..competences:
Basic knowledge of embedded systems architecture
Basic knowledge of electronic components and systems
Experience with Altium Designer or other PCB design software
Basic knowledge of communication protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, etc.)
Basic knowledge of C programming language
Attention to details, punctuality, sense of order, proactive work attitude and good will to learn and research new technologies
Experience in working with embedded systems through university or hobby is desirable

Rimac Automobili d.o.o..position_title: Embedded Hardware Librarian and Support Engineer Intern
Rimac Automobili d.o.o..position_desc:
Embedded Hardware Librarian and Support Engineer Intern position will grant you an opportunity to support various engineering teams with development of hardware components for Rimac Automobili vehicles and OEM projects. You will work in dynamic and supportive environment with experienced and ambitious engineers on high-end state-of-the-art projects utilizing latest technologies in respective fields and automotive industry.
Your tasks will be to build and maintain electronic component and product database within Altium Concord platform. This includes designing and updating symbols and footprints for various components, checking, and defining component parameters, validating components to be used in design, familiarizing with IPC and other industry standards, building knowledge on reliable design and more. Besides librarian tasks, you will also support engineering teams with ordering of components for prototyping, tools, and office supplies through ERP system, tracking of department budget, making RFQs and communicating with suppliers to receive technical support and quotations.

Our teams develop both hardware and software solutions for the Concept_One and C_Two as well as for numerous public and confidential projects, thus positioning Rimac as a leader in the development and production of high-performance EV technology solutions.
We are searching for students involved in Computer Science or Engineering and have good C/C++programming skills to join our Embedded Software Team and help us in creating and developing new and existing application solutions and algorithms. Rimac Automobili d.o.o..company_desc:
Rimac is a technology powerhouse, manufacturing electric hypercars and providing full technology solutions to global automotive manufacturers. Founded in 2009 with headquarters in Croatia, Rimac started as a garage project and grew into a globally recognized technology leader, built upon the passion and vision of the company's Founder and CEO Mate Rimac.
Strongly believing that electric propulsion systems can be used to power the new generation of sports cars and make them better, faster and more exciting, he has started the project with a handful of people as his team. The companyâ€™s flagship, the Concept_One, was entirely designed, developed and manufactured in-house. In 2018 Rimac introduced the next generation hypercar, the C_Two, a car alive with technology.
Today, the company numbers over 600 people and has grown into a leader within a highly competitive industry with the ambition to become a full electrification partner for many OEMs. Rimac Automobili has challenged the status-quo with the vision to revolutionize and reinvent the sports car with its unique technology thus successfully tackling the electrification challenge set upon the automotive industry. Most of all, we are excited to offer customers the opportunity to use our technology and know-how to create new and exciting products.
Rimac Automobili d.o.o..position_desc:
The main areas of work of the team are:
Requirements management:
Create technical requirements based on high level feature definition and stake-holder inputs.
Partition and decompose system level requirements to sub-system and component levels ensuring full traceability.
Coordinate with the other teams in Vehicle Engineering to define the system requirements.
Vehicle architecture definition:
Define of the CAN architecture and implementation.
Define of the different devices control and operation.
Software integration:
Gather and cross-check the development plans from all the development teams (internal and external).
Cooperate with the development teams to make sure all the software releases are compatible.
Perform integration tests in the lab to verify that the software is ready for the use in the cars.
Prepare software packages to be deployed in the different vehicles.
Handle CAN databases modification to support new features.
Vehicle commissioning and support:
Perform all the needed tests in newly developed cars to make sure all the systems work properly before they are driven.
Assist during vehicle tests, including being in the passenger seat during driving tests :O
Gather and analyze logs generated during test sessions.
Flash the different cars to the appropriate releases and verify that they are working properly.

Passion for cars! =D
Experience with versioning software (Git, SVN)
Proficient in English (written and spoken) for project and technical communication
Robust character with strong self-drive and motivation
Proactive attitude to problem-solving
Highly analytical approach to work
Ability to quickly learn new tools and technologies

The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.company_desc:
THE BLOCKHOUSE TECHNOLOGY LIMITED (TBTL)
Blockhouse boasts world-class scientific and engineering teams in both collective trust and trusted computing. It has leading scientists and teams implementing products based on TEEs (trusted execution environments), multi-party computation and blockchain, as well as a rapidly developing portfolio of IP in these areas. We mainly operate out of our offices based in Oxford, UK and Zagreb, Croatia.
We believe that trustless technology is the leading candidate for decentralised privacy-preserving computation in applications such as sharing access to big data. Similarly, we believe that blockchain is the best technology for ensuring integrity of records, rules and processes in decentralised systems.
MISSION STATEMENT
Developing Technologies for a Secure Digital Society
TBTL is a company created by scientists dedicated to building decentralised technology that can be trusted even when operated in a partisan and untrustworthy world. This technology is needed for the decentralised systems increasingly running modern society, and essential if we are to move away from centralised control and towards personal control of personal data.
Our speciality is creating the technology to make decentralised systems
trustworthy.
Our mission is to create the science and technology which allows us all to live in, and reap the benefits of, a connected world, while protecting integrity and individual control over personal data.
VISION
Secure Digital Civilisation
To use trusted and distributed computing technologies to create a more secure, private and fairer digital civilisation.
The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.position_desc:
You will develop a new CI/CD pipeline with Concurse or GoCD or some other pipeline-oriented CI/CD tool. This will include versioning of our service APIs, crates, etc. Also, organize this so that developers can maintain simple interdependent pipelines and compose them in more complex pipelines.
We offer a flexible work environment. The internship will be done mainly on a remote basis, meetings in the office will be scheduled upfront.
The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.compensation: 70 HRK net / h, payment via student contract

The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.position_desc:
Students joining our team will have the opportunity to learn about the latest security and privacy technologies in distributed systems and to develop user facing-components and our platform toolkit.
You can learn Rust code.
Our platform is based on microservices with trustless design, so you will be able to enhance your knowledge of distributed systems. You will be tackling new technologies with heavy emphasis on security and low-level languages. Our definition of done includes documentation maintenance and extensive testing.
We offer a flexible work environment. The internship will be done mainly on a remote basis, meetings in the office will be scheduled upfront.
Here are some projects you could work on:
SWE Track
Through this project you can gain more knowledge about software testing and security testing. Within software testing you will develop a better understanding of the complexity of software testing and you will know how to test when security is of utmost importance.
Security testing will concentrate on constructing and performing different security attacks, on how to secure services and building tools for security testing.
Exploring Tendermint for storing transactions
The goal of this project is to gain knowledge about blockchain and transactions, as well as research of possible use cases for TBTL with Tendermint, potentially for reg-tech or accountability.
This will include:
Â·       Deploying and running Tendermint
Â·       Getting yourself familiarized with the Tendermint API, and implementing Rust client
Â·       Defining transactions (simple use case) and research how to store them in Tendermint
(Crypto)currency exchange
The goal of the project is to add support for (crypto)currency exchange within custody. This mostly includes designing the communication protocol towards a third-party conversion API and extending the Money type abstraction with necessary functionalities. Ideally, this could then be integrated into a useful feature, i.e. allowing the user to define spending policies in less volatile currencies.
Extending shovel to do xyz
.
Depending on the state of shovel at the point of internship, you will extend its functionality and cover some of the other Boilerplate examples we in TBTL have identified. The scope of the feature is to extend the code generation tool and integrate the newly generated code with develop.
Secure online voting service
The goal of the project is to implement voting service in
TEE
(using
IntelSGX
). Access to the voting results should be controlled in a privacy-preserving manner. Ideally, service would use blockchain to ensure that votes are irrefutable and immutable.
The decision on which project you will work will be made after the interviews.
The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.compensation: 70 HRK net / h, payment via student contract

YAZAKI Europe Limited, Glavna podruÅ¾nic.company_desc:
Yazaki is a full-systems supplier of wire harness, electrical, and data products and solutions to all of the top 10 global automakers. With more than 249,000 employees in 45 countries, Yazaki is one of the  largest automotive supplier in the world. It provides customer support from initial concepts through from design and development to global mass production â€“ including after-sales-service parts. The companyâ€™s full-systems supplier expertise is helping global automotive manufacturers drive vehicle electrification, connectivity, and autonomy integration.
Yazaki has more than 75 years of wire harness, electrical, and data solutions experience and a deep understanding of global automotive standards. In addition to a comprehensive high-voltage products and systems portfolio, it has a wide range of high-voltage research and testing resources and extensive additive manufacturing and rapid prototyping capabilities.
As a truly global company deeply rooted in Japanese cultural traditions and values, Yazaki is a reliable partner for its customers. It is also committed to the preservation of the environment through the development of advanced electric components for hybrid and electric vehicles, the promotion of recycling, and the efficient use of resources.
Yazaki Branch Office Zagreb
is one of the companyâ€™s Regional Engineering Centers specializing in components. It employs approximately 150 people â€“ and growing. The center is continuing to expand its prototype build, automotive components testing and validation, high-voltage component and automotive data connection development, and advanced engineering activities.
To lear more you can chek us at:
https://www.yazaki-europe.com/index
YAZAKI Europe Limited, Glavna podruÅ¾nic.position_desc:
If you opt for a summer internship with us at Yazaki, we offer you the possibility to directly work in some of the most dynamic Teams at our Yazaki's R&D Center in Zagreb:
Data Connectivity and Advanced Engineering Team as well as Testing and Validation Team for HV & Data Connecitvity .
When we say
dynamic
- we mean collegial Teammates, always following new technology and growing with their knowledgeâ€¦ And now are willing to share their skills with you through a well-organized and inclusive Student Internship program!
During the internship, you would have the possibility to participate in development, design, simulation, prototyping, verification and validation of electrical HighFequency and Data-Connectivity connection systems (Electro-Mechanical Connection Systems) for the European automotive market.
If you would like to get better familiar with:
PCB Design, on how to modify and improve/benchmark of electro-mechanical parts for automotive applications (preferred Connectors, Terminals, EDS Harness, Connectivity-Devices);
You are also motivated to get familiar with mechanic, electronic- and high-frequency basics so as simulations acting in an automotive environment with high impact of electrical and mechanical stress like temperature, humidity, etc.
You are interested to learn about Design, Layout and support of simple Circuits and/or PCBs with supporting related Processes from the Prototype phase until Production
And last but not least- you would like to first-hand experience working in a global corporation & leading automotive parts supplier which has truly long tradition and is culture blend of different experiences from a wide range of sources, but with roots firmly planted in Japan
.............then you are a perfect Candidate to apply for our internship!
Your Team members & Mentor have already prepared a detailed three-week (15 workign days) Student internship program which covers some following topics:
Basics of PCB construction
Using the Mentor Graphics Xpedition program
DRC check
Description of PCBs for production
Generating Gerber files
Introduction to CST Microwave Studio
Preparation of models for simulation
PCB / connector electrical performance simulation (S-parameters, TDR impedance, electric and magnetic field distribution).
Comparison of simulation and measurement (if there are measurement results)
PCB / connector optimization
Analysis of the influence of different materials on PCB / connector performance
Display and analysis of results in relation to the requirements of the specification
Introduction to the process of testing and validation of automotive RF components
Overview of RF components (connectors, wires, terminals, PCBâ€¦) and Introduction to basic test RF specifications
Activities within the OpenAlliance association
S-parameters - theoretical introduction
Preparation of samples for measurement on a network analyzer (VNA)
Measurement of RF parameters using a network analyzer (VNA)
Automate the measurement of RF parameters during production using LabView
Automated test report generation using Python
.â€¦.
YAZAKI Europe Limited, Glavna podruÅ¾nic.competences:
Basic knowledge and/or interest for Simulation- and Design tools and other (e.g. ANSYS, CST, Eagle, Zyken, P-Spice, Mentor Graphics Designer, CST Microwave Studio etc.);
Some basic functional understanding of automotive wire harness connection systems
English language skills in written and spoken
Team oriented personality, with good communication and organization skills

FOREO is the Swedish beauty and wellbeing brand reinventing the industry for better. We exist to inspire self-confidence and deliver professional level solutions for all. When you feel good, you look good, and our mission is complete.
FOREO's designs are currently available in more than 12,000 stores across 80+ markets, winning more than 150 design and industry awards in the process.
